Package ComparativeGenomics.FileHandling.DataHandling

Class Alignment

java.lang.Object
ComparativeGenomics.FileHandling.DataHandling.Alignment
public final class Alignment extends Object
Stores the alignment files produced by the job.
Author:
franpeters, Marie Schmit
